statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) FROM PurchaseHistory
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_amount >= 50 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC, purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, purchase_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_amount FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING average_amount < 50
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR name LIKE '%son' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, category FROM purchases WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age LIMIT 5;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM Segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount FROM Purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM Segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, total_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30
SELECT order_id, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 1 ORDER BY order_date ASC

SELECT customer_name, purchase_quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN purchases ON orders.order_id = purchases.order_id WHERE order_total > 100 ORDER BY purchase_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price ASC
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_city FROM Customers WHERE customer_city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM Customers JOIN CustomerSegments ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerSegments.customer_id JOIN Segments ON CustomerSegments.segment_id = Segments.segment_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_purchases FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
